projects.title: Final Project E-commerce Web Application
projects.description: Developed a user interface (UI) using React. Created the backend server using Node.js to handle client requests. Stored data in a NoSQL database using MongoDB.

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  Hello, my name is Satapirom Khawatthu.
resume.description: I graduated from Generation's Junior Software Developer Bootcamp. With over 5 years of experience in research and development with hands-on experience in the MERN stack and an understanding of the software development lifecycle, which allowed me to develop problem-solving skills and analytical abilities combined with communication within diverse team environments. I am confident my diverse work experience will be valuable to the team. I am motivated to apply my previous work experiences and newly developed technical skills to launch my career in the tech sector.

experiences.position: Junior Software DeveloperJunior Software Developer Bootcamp Cohort 7 at Generation Thailand.
experiences.bullets:
Practiced fundamental programming and coding with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), and honed web application development skills. 
 Designed and implemented an e-commerce web application for the final project under mentor supervision, integrating Agile methods for project planning and management.
 Practiced behavioral skills and mindsets, such as a growth mindset, effective communication, collaborative teamwork, efficient time management, accountability, and adept problem-solving.

experiences.position: Product Specialist at Chem Sources Ltd., Part.
experiences.bullets:
Identified and developed unique selling propositions for new products by analyzing market trends and competitor offerings.
 Designed posters, advertisements, documents, and print media for online platforms, which contributed to increased brand visibility.
Authored technical articles for the company website, enhancing customer knowledge and trust.
Trained sales teams, boosting their confidence and sales effectiveness.
 Analyzed and resolved production process issues for clients, improving efficiency and resulting in repeat purchases.

experiences.position: R&D at Thaiva Laboratories CO., Ltd.
experiences.bullets:
Formulated development plans and executed tests for new formulations leading to a 20% improvement in product efficiency.
 Created flowcharts detailing production processes, enhancing operational clarity and efficiency.
 Risk assessments, identifying critical values, and implementing preventive measures to mitigate production risks.
 Utilized systematic problem-solving techniques to address production challenges, minimizing downtime and maximizing productivity

experiences.position: R&D Analysis at Nova Medicine CO., Ltd.
experiences.bullets:
Analyzed data, ensured pharmaceutical quality, & maintained lab equipment.
